vsParam:
That's not enough! Do 100 bunny hops after this!
You won't get stronger if you don't work hard!

Anise is wielding a wooden sword?
What's going on here? What am I looking at?

Oh, you are here, [px].
You come for the training, too?

No, thanks...
But why is Anise training?

Uh... She came to me the other day
and asked me to train her...

Ah... Anise is worried about her physical fitness.
But, Cresson... Don't you think bunny hops are a bit outdated?

What are you saying! This is a tried and tested
technique taught to me by the Captain himself!

Anise will make an excellent guard if she
keeps up with this training! So... Go for it, Anise!!

No no no...
I don't think Anise wants to be a guard...

Huff... puff... Drillmaster Cresson!
I've completed 100 sword slashes...

OK! On to the next drill!
Let's go to the next area, Anise!

Ha ha ha... hmm.
It's been so many times. How stubborn Anise is...

Hmm, Sorel!
You are observing Anise too.
This is not the first time, right?
Why don't you train with her?

No way.
I don't want to do bunny hops.

Anise has always been like this... She's too diligent sometimes,
if she finds a weakness she just has to correct it.

But her attempts always fail.
This has become part of her personality...

I think we can just leave her alone
unless she goes too far... So, may I ask a favor of you?

Uh? Ask a favor of us?
What is it?

Er, here's the thing. I think that Anise will be exhausted
sooner or later if she continues to train like this.

So, I hate to ask, but...
[px]. Can you prepare something to replenish her strength?

Ha ha ha... You guys really are best friends...
So, let's prepare something for her... Ha ha ha...
